Others: The match between Ghana and Namibia took place on 08/01/2024 in the International Friendlies.
The score remained 0-0 at half-time and full-time.
Daniel Amartey scored two goals for Ghana in the 38th and 43rd minutes.
Kennedy Amutenya scored a goal for Namibia in the 68th minute.
The match was officiated by a referee, but no specific name was provided.
